channel.title: blogging on Carolina Camassa
channel.description: Recent content in blogging on Carolina Camassa

item.title: Tips and tricks for painless blogging with Jupyter Notebooks
item.description: After starting this blog, I’ve gotten better at quickly converting and editing Jupyter notebooks so that they’re publish-ready. I thought I would share some of the tricks and shortcuts I use.

item.title: Why you should stop writing all your articles on Medium
item.description: I read articles on Medium almost every day. I owe a lot of my personal knowledge to that platform, but here’s what I think: If you know how to program, even just a little, and you write semi-regularly on Medium, you should stop doing that and open your own blog instead.
